T = input()
B = []
for i in range(T):
    C = []
    A = []
    J = ['a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h','i','j','k','l','m','n','o','p','q','r','s','t','u','v','w','x','y','z']
    t = 0
    n = str(raw_input())
    for j in n:
        C.append(j)
        A.append(j)
    C.reverse()
    if C == A:
        t = t + 1
    for k in A:
        if k in J:
            J.remove(k)
    if len(J) == 0:
        t = t + 1
    if t == 1 and len(J) == 0:
        B.append('pangram')
    elif t == 1 and len(J)!= 0:
        B.append('palindrome')
    elif t == 2:
        B.append('palingram')
    else:
        B.append('none')
for l in B:
    print l
